CustomField.description: Maps Canadian provinces from Billing State to QuickBooks province IDs. Returns 0 for unrecognized values.
CustomField.formula: VALUE(CASE(SBQQ__BillingState__c, "Alberta", "23", "British Columbia", "24", "Manitoba", "26", "New Brunswick", "39", "Newfoundland and Labrador", "29", "Northwest Territories", "30", "Nunavut", "31", "Ontario", "32", "Prince Edward Island", "33", "Quebec", "34", "Saskatchewan", "36", "Yukon", "38", "0" ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Maps Canadian provinces from Billing State to QuickBooks province IDs. Returns 0 for unrecognized values.
CustomField.label: Quickbooks Billing Province Id
